programmes.show_description: Thriller with Twin Peaks star MÃ¤dchen Amick. A private investigator helps a women discover the truth about her husband's apparent suicide. (2005)
Explosive thriller with Alaina Huffman. Desperate for money to help his sick mother, a troubled young man abducts a bus full of kids. Can a crisis negotiator take control and save their lives (2016)?
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.
Mind Games: The team investigate a homeless woman's claim that she witnessed the murder of a U.S. senator. Meanwhile, Bobby hopes to be named as the unit's new supervisor.

... Last Breath: Mystery drama starring Taylor Cole. When a fatal car crash raises red flags, a determined TV reporter and a seasoned detective join forces to uncover the truth. (2019)
Veritas: She must work to clear her name, expose a political conspiracy and close the case for good.
For Better Or Worse: Castle and Beckett are finally tying the knot but with the wedding just days away a shocking surprise from Beckett's past, involving a crazy night in Las Vegas.
Prescription For Murder: It's more kill than cure at Atlanta Memorial Hospital when a series of murders occurs, but can Hailey uncover the truth without meeting the same fate? (2019)
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.
Prescription For Murder: It's more kill than cure at Atlanta Memorial Hospital when a series of murders occurs, but can Hailey uncover the truth without meeting the same fate? (2019)
Murder, Murder: Dr Sloan investigates the murder of his friend. With a long list of possible suspects including the deceased's wife and business associates, can he identify a murderer?
Murder in the Dark: Dr Sloan investigates when his surgeon friend is suspected of committing the murder of a colleague while in a drunken rage.
Deadly Assets: Can Jessica prove whether a Cabot Cove fisherman is innocent of murdering a Chicago hitman?
Murder On The Thirtieth Floor: Jessica investigates the apparent suicide of her book editor in New York.
Bad Girls: As the investigation into a bank robbery points to a surprising trio of suspects, Lucy looks to reunite her grandmother with an old flame.
Driven: Castle is found drifting at sea with no memory of the months after his abduction en route to his and Beckett's wedding.
Montreal: The team investigate the murder of the CEO of a prominent toy company. Castle uncovers a lead to his disappearance and embarks on a risky investigation of his own.
...Sentence: Whodunnit with Kellie Martin and Lauren Holly. When a man she jailed is killed, fingers point at District Attorney Paulina D'Orazio. (2019)

Destitute divorcee Nellie is at rock bottom when she has her identity stolen. Can a potential lover help her track down the thief and restore her life (2008)?
A couple's lives become a living nightmare when they attempt to evict an unsafe live-in nanny from their house. Stars Lindsay Elston and Nicole Sterling. (2016)

...For Murder: Crime mystery starring Jewel. When Shannon finds a body in the house she's been hired to renovate, can this unlikely sleuth dust off the clues and crack a murder case too? (2017)
35 Millimetre Murder: A mix-up involving holiday photographs sees Dr Sloan investigate the abduction of a young woman.
The Murder Trade: Dr Sloan becomes a prime suspect for murder when the hospital administrator who recommended his departure from Community General is killed.
Time To Die: Jessica investigates after one of her student's is accused of murdering his stepfather.
The Dying Game: Jessica investigates the murders of two men involved in the sale of a prominent New York building.
Endings And Beginnings: A computer security breach leads to an informant's murder and jeopardises the case against an arms dealer.
Clear and Present Danger: When a pool shark is murdered Castle and Beckett suspect that the killer may have paranormal powers.
Child's Play: Castle must go undercover in a second grade classroom to track down a witness in the murder of an ice cream vendor, using classroom artwork in place of composite drawings.
...Evidence: Murder mystery with singer Jewel. A home renovation expert uncovers more than dry rot when the bones of a long-missing girl are found in her current project. (2017)
